title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: A communications gaffe with a neighbor or sibling opens up a path to improving your relationship. Either of you could choose to become hung-up on the blunder now, or you can mutually agree to hash it out. Perhaps theres no easy way to take the sting out of hurtful words, but avoiding your responsibility or playing the role of a victim only adds insult to injury. Instead, examine whether certain accusations elicited a specific reaction from you because you are harboring buried feelings. Thankfully, applying the balm of truth can heal a rift and set you both free. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
